title: RVCE/MSRIT ECE vs PES ECE
content: I have posted this question before but I am posting it again because I am in a huge dilemma. Last date to surrender PESSAT seat is 17th July. First round of COMEDK counselling happens on 18th July. Some people were telling second round of PES counselling will happen on 22nd and 23rd July. I will be out of station during that weekend for personal reasons so I might not be able to attend 2nd round of counselling. My COMEDK rank can get me admission in RVCE or MSRIT in third round. I am not interested in placements because I plan to do MS

comments.body: For ms I guess you should go to the one where its the easies to score good cgpa
GPA is one of the factors - you also need to build a good profile overall since a holistic approach is taken to shortlisting people. Said this, I would suggest RVCE.
Don't go for ec, go for CS!
I am not interested in CS
Go to the one that has absolute grading and not relative grading..
